entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 09
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo from the special event 1982-0321 Birthday Pūjā, London, UK has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution (tif-neg) from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 6 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: UK 1982.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 08
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 22 Photos from the special event 1989-1028 Shopping and Portraits Sessions, Florence, Tuscany, Italy have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 medium resolutions and 18 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 28 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Italy 1989.
The event has as well 2 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 16: Handwritings, Part 14

Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 13 jpegs of 1988-1000 Handwriting Comments and Changes of a Prepared Talk, Pune, Maharashtra, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 13 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 13 jpegs in the smallest gallery of handwritings: Collection Handwritings.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.
